channel.title: music on GDLP
channel.description: Recent content in music on GDLP

item.title: i listened to 50 albums
item.description: i have been very depressed, I’m not gonna lie. I have realised that in depression, I find one thing I like and I hold onto it for dear life. I have also realised that to offset that, I am much happier when there’s variety in my day. I eat something new for breakfast, I speak to someone I wouldn’t usually speak to. Whatever. So, in an attempt to climb out of depression, I decided to listen to every album off NME’s top 50 albums of 2021.
